name: Omastar
author: Akira Komayama
flavor_text: Omastar’s sharp fangs could crush rock, but the Pokémon can attack only the prey that come within reach of its tentacles.

abilities.name: Primordial Tentacles
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, your opponent’s Active Pokémon can’t retreat.

attacks.name: Aqua Split
attacks.effect: This attack also does 30 damage to 2 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
